allow:

Initial commit: Complete SLink URL shortener service

- Add responsive web interface for URL shortening
- Implement Cloudflare Functions for API endpoints
- Add URL shortening with custom slug support
- Implement redirect functionality with click tracking
- Configure Cloudflare KV storage integration
- Add basic analytics and statistics
- Include deployment configuration for Cloudflare Pages

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
